overview: Recruited for a TV show, young hunks must hide nothing of their lives on the set and back stage, including fans entering their hotel rooms, the casting session with the producer and his assistant, and firemen and machinists who can't resist their sex appeal ! You'll even see the cameraman dropping his camera to mingle with this flood of sensuality! In this movies produced in 1997, Cadinot preview the real TV mania which will invade our screen few years later.
title: Techno Boys
